borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Erection of a front roof extension; erection of a replacement rear roof extension, and a replacement enlarged rear extension at second floor level over part of the existing back addition with a new dormer window to the side of rear back addition; erection of a rear extension at first floor level over part of the existing back addition; erection of a single storey extension to the side of the main building following the demolition of existing side lean to extension; erection of a single storey rear extension, to the side and rear of the existing back addition following the demolition of part of ground floor rear back addition; installation of 2no rooflights above the main flat roof at roof level; erection of new replacement railings to existing roof terraces at first and second floor level; infilling of 1no window to the side of rear back addition at first floor level; erection of an air source heat pump with acoustic enclosure of timber screening in the rear garden; erection of a bin store in the front garden.
